price: Ona altın bilezikler verilmeli veya onunla birlikte yakınında yer alan (yardımcı) melekler gelmeli değil miydi?
arabic: فَلَوۡلَآ أُلۡقِيَ عَلَيۡهِ أَسۡوِرَةٞ مِّن ذَهَبٍ أَوۡ جَآءَ مَعَهُ ٱلۡمَلَٰٓئِكَةُ مُقۡتَرِنِينَ

version.title: Turkish translation - Shaaban Britsh
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Turkish by Shaaban Britsh. Notice: Some referred translated verses corrected by Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: falawlā ul'qiya ʿalayhi aswiratun min dhahabin aw jāa maʿahu al-malāikatu muq'tarinīna
